title: T206 big name BVG 4-5 HOF - M. Brown, Chance, E. Collins, Keeler

posts.post_title: T206 big name BVG 4-5 HOF - M. Brown, Chance, E. Collins, Keeler
posts.post_content:
Great looking cards.  Not my first choice of holder either.

Prices assume no fee method but include shipping.  Goods please add 3%.

Brown Mordecai Chi Polar Bear BVG 4.5 - $700
Brown Mordecai Cubs BVG 4.5 - $800
Brown Mordecai portrait BVG 4 - $800
Chance red portrait BVG 5.5 - $1400
Collins Eddie BVG 4 - $800
Keeler batting BVG 4.5 - $800
Keeler portrait BVG 5 - $875
